text: Michael Jonathan W Hall (born c.1938), is a male former rower who competed for England and Oxford. ==Rowing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the coxless pair at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He rowed for Oxford against Cambridge in the 1958 boat race and was with Lincoln College, Oxford at the time. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:English male rowers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Rowers at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Jonathan Hall (rower)
